mapper.sql: id, position_name, work_min_year, work_max_year, education, job_nature, position_id, position_create_time, city, company_logo, industry_field, position_advantage, min_salary, max_salary, company_short_name, company_min_size, company_max_size, position_lables, industry_lables, finance_stage, company_label_List, district, business_zones, company_full_name, first_type, second_type, subwayline, stationname, linestaion, last_login, gps,include, cr_time, op_time, is_valid, last_ver,third_type
mapper.select: select position_create_time from position_detail WHERE include = #{include} AND city = #{city} AND third_type = #{thirdType} AND is_valid = 1 ORDER BY position_create_time desc limit 1;
mapper.insert: insert into position_detail (id, position_name, work_min_year, work_max_year, education, job_nature, position_id, position_create_time, city, company_logo, industry_field, position_advantage, min_salary, max_salary, company_short_name, company_min_size, company_max_size, position_lables, industry_lables, finance_stage, company_label_List, district, business_zones, company_full_name, first_type, second_type, subwayline, stationname, linestaion, last_login, gps,include, cr_time, op_time, is_valid, last_ver,third_type) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{positionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workMinYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workMaxYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobNature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{positionCreateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industryField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionAdvantage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{companyShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyMinSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyMaxSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{positionLables,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industryLables,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{financeStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyLabelList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessZones,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secondType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subwayline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linestaion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLogin,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gps,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{include,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()),UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()) , 1, 0,#{thirdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into position_detail ( position_name, work_min_year, work_max_year, education, job_nature, position_id, position_create_time, city, company_logo, industry_field, position_advantage, min_salary, max_salary, company_short_name, company_min_size, company_max_size, position_lables, industry_lables, finance_stage, company_label_List, district, business_zones, company_full_name, first_type, second_type, subwayline, stationname, linestaion, last_login, gps, include,cr_time, op_time, is_valid, last_ver,third_type) values
( #{position.positionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.workMinYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position.workMaxYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position.education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.jobNature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position.positionCreateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{position.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.companyLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.industryField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.positionAdvantage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.minSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{position.maxSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{position.companyShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.companyMinSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position.companyMaxSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position.positionLables,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.industryLables,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.financeStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.companyLabelList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.businessZones,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.companyFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.firstType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.secondType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.subwayline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.stationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.linestaion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.lastLogin,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{position.gps,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{position.include,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()),UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()) , 1, 0,#{position.thirdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
